short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lights up with a new notification count whenever you have new activity waiting for you at LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clicking on the extension's icon is also an easy way to take you directly to the LinkedIn website to view your new activity.

Privacy Policy: https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy

By installing this extension, you agree to LinkedIn's User Agreement at https://www.linkedin.com/legal/user-agreement

Please send any feedback to liextension-feedback@linkedin.com
